response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to both myself and you, with an estimated worth of $1,500,000 to us both. I understand its importance and the potential it holds for you, which is why I am extending this exclusive offer to you.

I am proposing to sell the product to you at a special price of $1,425,000. This offer represents a significant saving of $75,000 compared to its full value, making it an attractive proposition for someone who appreciates its true worth and recognizes its potential benefits.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations and contribute significantly to your endeavors.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1425000}
